page.shortlink: api sql namespace result set object execute post process function
page.description: Execute portable SQL against a resultset, Allows for filtering after fetching a result set.

discussion.p: ExecutePostProcess can be used to quickly generate more restrictive lists from a different list, It is useful when dealing with static sources, including JSON data files.
In the following example, all the customers in the Northwind database are fetched, but we then extract just those cities from customers in France.

page.example:
dim cn as sql::Connection
? cn.Open("::Name::Northwind") = .T.
? cn.Execute("select * from customers") = .T.
dim rs as sql::ResultSet ? cn.ResultSet.ExecutePostProcess(rs,"select distinct city from customers where country = 'France' order by city") = .T.
? rs.ToString() = Lille Lyon Marseille Nantes Paris Reims Strasbourg Toulouse Versailles
